content.rendered:
Shopify Website Store SEO Micro Audit

Discover your Shopify store’s top conversion killers with this free and personalized micro audit.

Expect to gain:

Request your free audit below.

*Please note that while this audit is free, it’s intended for businesses looking to invest $6,500/month or more in improving their Shopify store.

Trusted By

What is the Shopify micro audit?

Our free Shopify micro audit is a data-driven critique of the usability and effectiveness of a landing page of your choosing.

 

It is developed using data from our insight platforms as well as an expert analysis by members of Huemor’s Grow team.

 

This personalized presentation is then delivered via conference call and led by one of our lead conversion strategists.

“We’ve seen an increase in average order value. There’s also been an uptick in the website conversion rate of visitors to buyers. I frequently get compliments from customers on how easy our website is to navigate and to find exactly what they’re looking for.”

– Chauncey Twine, VP of Ecommerce, Briogeo

Who is right for a Shopify mico audit?

This audit is perfect for Shopify stores that are:

 

– Frustrated with low online sales

– Suffering from low conversion rates

– Under-utilizing traffic which doesn’t convert

– Tired of cart and checkout abandonment

– Losing sales due to site speed

– Looking to improve average order value

“Huemor’s attention to detail, level of expertise, professionalism, responsiveness, and willingness to make sure that they are creating the best outcome for the client is truly unmatched. I am looking forward to working with them as a retainer client in the future.

– Isfahan Chambers Harris, Founder & CEO, Alodia Haircare

How does this help me?

Shopify websites can be like a maze for consumers: full of traps and barriers for them to get stuck in.

 

Your consumers are likely getting stuck too. The Shopify micro audit tells you where.

 

We will collect data from our insight platforms to assess the problem areas which are hurting your visitor’s ability to convert into a lead or customer, including: User experience, path to purchase or conversion, content effectiveness, and more.

Are you ready to supercharge your Shopify conversions?

Find out how we can help you achieve your goals by setting up a complimentary Shopify micro audit.

Get Your Audit
